org.stekikun.dolmen.syntax

Class Regular.Gen.Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.syntax.Regular.Gen.Config
  • Enclosing class:
    Regular.Gen

    public static final class Regular.Gen.Config
extends Object
    Configuration of the generator Probabilities specified for each kind of regular expressions are cumulative, can be set individually but must be increasing, since they are tested in the order of definition.
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer
